summary: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.
cast: Eion Bailey|Clifton Collins Jr.|Will Kemp|Val Kilmer|Jonny Lee Miller|Kathryn Morris|Christian Slater|LL Cool J|Patricia Velasquez|Cassandra Bell|Daniël Boissevain|Antonie Kamerling|Jasmine Sendar|Trevor White
title: Cazadores de mentes (Mindhunters)
